value_claims.claim_title: 50% faster security investigation closure with Google Security Operations
value_claims.claim_description: Vertiv closed security investigations 50% faster using Google Security Operations platform.
value_claims.source_quote: Vertiv closed security investigations 50% faster with Google Security Operations
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Google Security Operations includes AI-powered features like alert triage agent and malware analysis agent that directly automate investigation tasks.

context_claims.claim_description: Vertiv is the customer organization that achieved faster security investigation closure.
context_claims.source_quote: Vertiv closed security investigations 50% faster with Google Security Operations

context_claims.claim_title: Security operations and threat detection function
context_claims.claim_description: The value claim relates to security investigation and threat detection operations.
context_claims.source_quote: Google Security Operations brings together our visibility, threat detection, AI powered security operations

context_claims.claim_description: The AI solution used is Google Security Operations, which includes alert triage agents and malware analysis agents.
context_claims.source_quote: The alert triage agent in Google Security Operations will perform dynamic investigations on behalf of users.

context_claims.claim_title: CISO collaboration and security posture improvement
context_claims.claim_description: Mike Orosz, CISO at Vertiv, participated in CISO Connect to address security challenges and share best practices.
context_claims.source_quote: We are all solving for the same security challenges; CISO Connect offers a safe environment to collaborate and share, unlike any other conference, said Mike Orosz, CISO, Vertiv.

context_claims.claim_description: The security capabilities and customer results were announced at Google Cloud Next conference in April 2025.
context_claims.source_quote: We just wrapped our annual Google Cloud Next conference in Las Vegas
